hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Magic Meter#.
